sources.name: sourceNames
sources.script:
source(output(
		acctnum as string,
		fullname as string,
		phone as string,
		zip as string
	),
	allowSchemaDrift: true,
	validateSchema: false) ~> sourceNames

transformations.name: Orig
transformations.script:
CreateRowHash select(mapColumn(
		acctnum,
		fullname,
		phone,
		zip,
		SoundexValue,
		hashvalue
	))~> Orig

transformations.name: Copy
transformations.script:
CreateRowHash select(mapColumn(
		acctnum,
		fullname,
		phone,
		zip,
		SoundexValue,
		hashvalue
	))~> Copy

transformations.name: JoinCopyToOrig
transformations.script:
Grouping, Copy join(Grouping@hashvalue == Copy@hashvalue,
	joinType:'inner',
	broadcast: 'none')~> JoinCopyToOrig

transformations.name: FinalResults
transformations.script:
JoinCopyToOrig select(mapColumn(
		acctnum,
		fullname,
		phone,
		zip
	))~> FinalResults
